EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Service Virtualization Puzzle (OSV) - 2015.11.17.Email - Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: How To Solve the Service Virtualization Puzzle
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
How To Solve the Service Virtualization Puzzle
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Continuous Testing can only go so far if your tests hit a wall of unstable or unavailable services. The reality is that true agile continuous testing requires service virtualization.
Join our webinar “How To Solve the Service Virtualization Puzzle“, as Robert Wagner shares about Tricentis’ solution to this common issue: Tosca Testsuite’s Orchestrated Service Virtualization.
In the webinar Robert will discuss how to:
- Create virtualized services from scratch based on WSDL or XSDs - Record communication in case there is no service definition available - Combine frontend automation and backend service virtualization for enterprise E2E testing
Register now <http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/how-to-solve-the-service-virtualization-puzzle-webinar?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> for the free webinar on November 17th, 2015 at 4:00 PM CEST. See you there! Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/how-to-solve-the-service-virtualization-puzzle-webinar?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/how-to-solve-the-service-virtualization-puzzle-webinar?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Tue, Nov 17, 2015 4:00 p.m. – 5:00 p.m. CEST
Robert Wagner Product Owner, Orchestrated Service Virtualization Tricentis
